All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
An atomic alteration of an entity.
ActionResourceConverterFactory
ResourceConverterFactory for basic actions.
ArgVerify
Static argument verification methods.
AveragedValue
A value represented as the average of its previous several samples.
BasicParsers
Returns ObjectParsers parsing to a "basic" object format, like String, Number, Iterable, or Map.
BasicWriters
Returns ObjectWriters capable of writing "basic" object formats, like String, Number, Iterable, or Map.
Component
A container of entity data.
ComponentConverter<T extends Component>
Converts between T and a "basic" serializable object representation.
ComponentConverters
Provides access to ComponentConverter implementations on the classpath.
Config
Deprecated.
prefer app-level config files
Entity
A container of Components of distinct implementation types.
EntityPool
A set of uniquely-identified "component-bag" entities.
EntityTemplate
Applies a set of components to an entity.
EntityTemplateResourceConverterFactory
ResourceConverterFactory for basic entity templates.
FloatOps
Provides functions for comparing floating-point values in a consistent manner.
GameEngine
Central game management module.
GameSystem
Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.
Matrix2
A 2x2 matrix.
Matrix3
A 3x3 matrix.
Matrix4
A 4x4 matrix.
ObjectConverters
Returns common basic object -> typed object converters.
ObjectParser<T>
Parses keyed ObjectParsers from an input stream.
ObjectWriter<T>
Writes ObjectWriters to an output stream.
Pipeline
Updates a group of GameSystems as a unit.
Registry<T>
A collection of keyed resources lazily evaluated against their owning container.
Resource<T>
Returns a T given a Registry.
ResourceConverterFactory<T>
Returns a converter of basic objects to resources.
ResourceConverters
Provides access to dynamically-loaded ResourceConverterFactory implementations.
Resources
Provides safe access to resources.
Sampler
Samples time elapsed between invocations of a sampling method.
Suspend
A shared bucket of handles/requests for temporarily halting execution of systems.
Vector1
Deprecated.
provides minimal utility - prefer a double property
Vector2
A head at some point in 2 dimensions and tail at (0, 0).
Vector3
A head at some point in 3 dimensions and tail at (0, 0, 0).
Viewport
A constrained view on a renderable artifact.
